translate.about_def: FalseCognates.com is a website where people can read and share examples of false cognates, which are pairs of words (among different languages or within the same language) that sound similar but have different meanings and/or roots.
translate.home_def: False Cognates are a pair of words, either between different languages or within the same language, that sound similar but have different meanings and/or different roots. For a more precise definition please refer:
